text: Yalakweyo ni ligongo lyanti ŵanganyao (achinakunaku) ŵatite pakwasalila aŵala (achimakafili) ŵaŵaichimile ayila yaŵatulwisye Allah: “Chitunkunde ine mu ichindu (yenu, mpela yakum’benga Muhammadi ﷺ, ni kwagwisya ulesi ŵakusaka kuja kumenyana namwe ngondo).” Sano Allah ni akumanyilila asili syao
